meanings.sent1: The suitcase had an expandable compartment for extra clothes.
meanings.sent2: The expandable table could accommodate more guests when needed.
meanings.sent3: The balloon animal artist made an expandable giraffe that kept growing taller!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an expandable universe, always open to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The expandable garden hose stretched out to reach every corner of the yard.

meanings.definition: Capable of being enlarged or extended
meanings.sent1: The expandable storage shelves allowed for more books to be added.
meanings.sent2: The expandable waistband on his pants made them comfortable to wear.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed expandable, as it kept producing more and more rabbits!
meanings.sent4: His expandable knowledge of history amazed his classmates.
meanings.sent5: The expandable bridge connected the two sides of the river seamlessly.
